IQM Benchmarks
##############

:Release: |release|
:Date: |today|
:Source Code: `<https://github.com/iqm-finland/iqm-benchmarks>`_

Quantum Characterization, Verification, and Validation (QCVV) tools for quantum computing.
Developed by `IQM <https://meetiqm.com/>`_.
